actions.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.
Senate Committee on the Judiciary discharged by Unanimous Consent.
Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

official_title: A resolution designating the week of August 2 through August 8, 2010, as "National Convenient Care Clinic Week", and supporting the goals and ideals of raising awareness of the need for accessible and cost-effective health care options to complement the traditional health care model.

summary.text: Designates the week of August 2-August 8, 2010, as National Convenient Care Clinic Week. Expresses support for such Week's goal of raising awareness of the need for accessible and cost-effective health care options to complement the traditional health care model. Encourages use of, and calls on the states to support the establishment of, convenient care clinics.

titles.title: A resolution designating the week of August 2 through August 8, 2010, as "National Convenient Care Clinic Week", and supporting the goals and ideals of raising awareness of the need for accessible and cost-effective health care options to complement the traditional health care model.
